Hi :) I‚Äôm Lily (she/they), a musician, artist and tech nerd. I mainly make 8-bit NES/FamiTracker arrangements of nostalgic game soundtracks from my childhood like DPPt, PMD2 and HGSS (but also other types of music) that you can listen to on PeerTube https://makertube.net/@lily_bit_music and YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFLp8Is-lEMpQvhoY95Gorg or any music streaming service :acnh_jamming_to_music:

I also like drawing, mainly pixel art of cute characters and of course the art or sometimes animations for my music videos, and I have several OCs that mean a lot to me (that are not yet public but will be soon). :wigglytuff_wide_open_smile: :wigglytuff_omg:

Messing around with computers has been a passion of mine since I was very young. I use Arch Linux + KDE + Wayland, a PinePhone + Keyboard running Arch + Sxmo and I self-host stuff like this GoToSocial instance on my home server. I‚Äôm not a fan of stuff like crypto and AI, though. :xenia_laptop:

I love Star Trek, I started watching chronologically in 2021 (present location: concluding TNG with the films). The stories and the people writing them give me hope that an entirely different society is possible. Infinite diversity in infinite combinations; live long and prosper! üññ

Currently I describe myself as a bisexual (admitted to myself in 2023) non-binary trans girl (admitted to myself in 2022). Except for people very close to me, I‚Äôm still closeted IRL. I‚Äôm still figuring myself out and very slowly gathering the courage to try new things. I‚Äôm also likely neurodivergent which has been confirmed but not yet fully diagnosed by professionals. :blobhaj_heart_trans: :blobhaj_flag_bisexual:

I‚Äôm very introverted and shy, so I don‚Äôt engage in conversations often and usually just give likes. My social battery (and any battery really) is very limited, so it often takes me longer to reply (or do anything really). :acnh_sable_face: :blobcat_snuggle:

Like a lot of people here, I only boost media posts if they have alt text to make sure everyone can enjoy them. :dragon_heart:

Thank you for checking out my profile, have a wonderful day and my favourite colour is yellow ‚ú®üíõ‚ú®
